name: Time Defense
description: In the distant future, where time travel is a reality, powerful bioweapons were created as the newest tools of war. Due to an unforeseen turn of events, these bioweapons have escaped into the past, becoming the basis for the ancient myths of legendary creatures! Take on the role of a warrior sent back in time to eradicate this powerful threat before it endangers history as we know it, and defend against an onslaught of enemies with an arsenal of high-tech weaponry and upgrades!
